summary: Completed testing of admin functionality, event management, and upcoming events display for UnTrash Berlin. All 5 reported issues have been verified as FIXED.
seed_data_creation: Test future event (event_test_future) was created by main agent for testing upcoming events
context_for_next_testing_agent: All admin and event features are working. Admin user stephanj.thurm@gmail.com has is_admin=true in database. Session token is valid for 7 days from creation.

issue_1_admin_link_visibility.details: Admin link appears in navbar for admin user (stephanj.thurm@gmail.com). The red 'Admin' button with Shield icon is visible.

issue_2_admin_panel_functionality.details: Admin Panel loads at /admin route. Shows User Management section with users, Trash Reports Management with delete buttons, and Pending Area Cleanings section (empty when no pending areas).

issue_3_admin_delete_trash_reports.details: Delete button is visible and functional in admin panel for trash reports. Backend DELETE /api/admin/trash/{report_id} endpoint works correctly.

issue_4_event_deletion.details: Delete button (X icon) appears for events in group modal. Visible for event creator, group admin, and app admin. Backend DELETE /api/groups/{group_id}/events/{event_id} endpoint works.

issue_5_dashboard_upcoming_events.details: Future events display on dashboard in 'Upcoming Group Events' section. Shows event title, description, date/time, and group name.

backend_api_tests.GET /api/auth/me: PASSED - Returns is_admin: true for admin user
backend_api_tests.GET /api/events/upcoming: PASSED - Returns future events with group names
backend_api_tests.GET /api/admin/users: PASSED - Returns list of users (admin only)
backend_api_tests.GET /api/admin/areas/pending: PASSED - Returns pending area cleanings (admin only)
backend_api_tests.DELETE /api/groups/{group_id}/events/{ev: PASSED - Endpoint exists and responds correctly

mocked_apis_note: Notification system is MOCKED - logs to console and stores in mock_notifications collection
